lines.line: They said a soldier's life was lonely, until I found him on that battlefield.
I was just a stray, surviving in a war-torn world.
He gave me shelter when bombs fell around us.
Every morning, he'd check if I was safe.
I followed him everywhere, even when danger was near.
Then came the day his team had to evacuate.
He looked back one last time, our eyes meeting across the distance.
Now I wait by the camp they left behind, hoping someday he'll return.

parsed_script.full_script: They said a soldier's life was lonely, until I found him on that battlefield.  I was just a stray, surviving in a war-torn world.  He gave me shelter when bombs fell around us.  Every morning, he'd check if I was safe.  I followed him everywhere, even when danger was near.  Then came the day his team had to evacuate.  He looked back one last time, our eyes meeting across the distance.  Now I wait by the camp they left behind, hoping someday he'll return.
